text: The Michigan Memorial at Vicksburg National Military Park The Michigan State Memorial is located on Union Avenue within the Vicksburg, Mississippi, National Military Park. The memorial is an obelisk made of white Bethel Granite that stands in height. It cost $10,000 and was dedicated on November 10, 1916. The sculptor was Herbert Adams. The design features a female allegory of the Spirit of Michigan.http://www.nps.gov/vick/historyculture/michigan-memorial.htm ==References== Category:Obelisks in the United States
title: Michigan Memorial
